p: Three different prepared VA-C leaf extracts with a 20% (mg/ml) concentration were screened for their anticandidal activity using the agar well-diffusion method ( National Committee for Clinical Laboratory Standards, 1993) against three unicellular fungi. Candida tropicalis and Candida albicans were provided by King Fahd Hospital, Al Khobar, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Candida ciferrii was obtained from the Biology Department, College of Science, Imam Abdulrahman Bin Faisal University.
